sentences.en: California reinstated the death penalty in 1977.
sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚于1977年恢复了死刑。

sentences.en: His supporters failed in their attempt to reinstate the President in the White House.
sentences.cn: 试图使总统重新入主白宫的努力失败了.

sentences.en: Install rebuilding kits according to procedures and reinstate equipment into production environment.
sentences.cn: 根据流程安装改装件并恢复生产.

sentences.en: The governor is said to have agreed to reinstate five senior workers who were dismissed.
sentences.cn: 据说州长已同意给5名被解雇的高级雇员复职。

sentences.en: The rules expired in 2002 and Congress is considering whether to reinstate them.
sentences.cn: 那些法规已于2002年过期,国会正在审定是否应该予以恢复.

sentences.en: There he proposed to reinstate the ancient Olympic Games.
sentences.cn: 会议上,他提出恢复古代奥林匹克运动会.

sentences.en: To reinstate GRUB as the system boot loader it needs to be reinstalled into the MBR.
sentences.cn: 若要恢复为系统引导程序需要重新安装GRUB到到MBR中.

sentences.en: Too late, then, to remedy the missed opportunity of Basle II or to reinstate Glass - Steagall.
sentences.cn: 挽回《巴塞尔新资本协议》失去的机会,或恢复《格拉斯 - 斯蒂格尔法案》都太晚了.

sentences.en: What they did was to reinstate classical theory.
sentences.cn: 他们所要做的,是恢复古典理论的地位.

trans.tran_en: if someone is reinstated, they are officially given back their job after it was taken away

trans.tran_cn: 使复原，使恢复，使恢复健康，使复任
